PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SensorTypeLightSensor
PropertySetDef.Definition: A device that senses or detects light. HISTORY: LightSensorSensorSetPoint changed to SetPointIlluminance. Range, accuracy and time constant deleted.

PropertyDef.Name: SetPointIlluminance
PropertyDef.Definition: The illuminance value to be sensed. Use IfcPropertyBoundedValue.SetPointValue to set the set point value.
